website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight cleats with durable synthetic upper that is comfortable and breaks in quickly.
pros: Decent amount of arch support with adequate space in the toe box
Affordable option if your child is going through growth spurts, and they’ll only be wearing the same size for one season
Tongue is ultra-thin to account for socks and ankle protector in shin guards
cons: A bit too narrow for children with wider feet
Materials are decent, but not high quality
You get what you pay for with these

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. My son has had them since August 2019 (it's currently December 2019) and they have held up very well after he used them in weekly practice and a weekly tournament. They run a little small. Originally when I ordered them my son, who is 9, was using a 5.5 size but that was too tight. I ordered a 6, which didn't give him much room to be honest. And at the time they did not offer half sizes so they are fitting a little snug now. Wish I could order him another pair but the next available size is 11!
customer_reviews.author: Just my 2 cents

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price, nice padding, better than Nike Tiempo
customer_reviews.text: My tween soccer player grew out of her cleats mid-season. I bought these cleats in desperation. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and comfort. This was her first pair of Puma cleats. Before she only wore Nike Tiempo. From now on I'm saving the $10 or so delta in price and will buy these Puma's again. Nice padding. Strong foot liner. Great for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: whydidibuythat

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure about these
customer_reviews.text: These are very awesome looking, but my daughter trips on the field on the field all the time now and never did before. She is also the goalie and has a hard time doing hard goal kicks now and never did before. Either the shoes don’t grip well, or they’re awkward to run in. I am about to buy replacement shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Summer L Frederick

customer_reviews.title: They're really cool
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable, but unfortunately her feet are just too wide for the shoes. We loved them and really wanted them to fit but keeping them was not an option for her.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: My son is very happy with these Pumas
customer_reviews.text: Our 10-year-old son has been wearing these for team play for about 2-3 months now. The shoes are holding up well. He likes that they are comfortable and likes the color scheme (yellow with red).
customer_reviews.author: MG541

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe...GOAL!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to play soccer. She could not fit in last years size 5 so I got a 6.5. Fit is perfect with enough room to grow a little but not too much. She has a wide foot but fit was perfect. She loved the colors and design. I loved the price! A win win for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats
customer_reviews.text: They look great and my daughter loves them. It's nice to have cleats that not everyone has. These cleats are built well and are comfortable for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Turns you into a superstar.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not saying these will make you kid a superstar but once my daughter put these on she averaged over a hat trick a game.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good product
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great fit. My daughter enjoyed these during her soccer season. I actually saw a few others with the same shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For NARROW feet
customer_reviews.text: Length was correct, but this shoe was extremely narrow, and thus too small. Never had the chance to wear on the pitch.
customer_reviews.author: Dan+Em

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat!
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be great quality so far. I had a feeling they run slightly smaller than other brands (Puma tends to) and I was right. I ordered accordingly and got a perfect fit for my son. They look "cool" for him which was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: mamasboyz

customer_reviews.title: For slim foot only
customer_reviews.text: This would be the perfect shoes if your kid has a slim foot. Go half size higher for extra socks room.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Good deal, good quality and pretty. Fits well to my petite 11 years old daughter. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: luflorida

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purple soccer cleats!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted purple soccer cleats we ordered these. They did not disappoint- great quality and comfort!
customer_reviews.author: 952Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. He said they’re comfortable and he can play well in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this shoe a half size up and it still ran too small. However it's good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: LAVAUN

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes good price
customer_reviews.text: Good soccer shoes for my grandson fits as per size! shipped prompt and on time!!!
customer_reviews.author: killrb

customer_reviews.title: Got these at a great price, which is important as kids will out ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these at a great price, which is important as kids will out grow them so quickly. Top brand with good selection in sizes and colors. Kids and mom very satisfied. Saved me time from shopping around sports stores.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S

customer_reviews.title: Lots of goals
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. My daughter scored a ton of goals with these. Lasted a full season with no problems or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Affordable soccer shoes
customer_reviews.text: Work well- my son wears these with lace bands and they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni R.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She loves them, they are comfy & cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son, it’s lightweight and fits well
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product! Size as expected!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says she really likes the fit of these cleats!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn W. VA

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats
customer_reviews.text: Great little cleats! My kids love them and they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. My son loves them so far at the beginning of the season.
customer_reviews.author: Grahamcrackers

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and beautiful colors. My son says it is comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla H

customer_reviews.title: Great color and fit
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! And he looks good on the soccer field.
customer_reviews.author: Amy De Simone

customer_reviews.title: The cleat to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my beginning 5 year old soccer boy! Super soft and wonderful fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Herbert

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: as described, Puma - good quality, my kid is very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: X. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes but I had to order about 1 1/2 whole size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Zeus

customer_reviews.title: Women's size 7.5
customer_reviews.text: I wear 7.5 in women's size, these fit perfect. I love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner cleat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the color and they have good stretch for his wide feet
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit my 7 yr old great and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Klaus P. Lotter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was excellent, correct sizing information and exact what was offered.
customer_reviews.author: Xavi

customer_reviews.title: My son loved the shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the shoes! Goalbox was awesome at shipping and communication. I would buy from them in a heart beat! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: jordi

product_meta.title: PUMA Kids Spirit FG Soccer Shoe
product_meta.description:
The PUMA spirit is a value engineered boot which is strongly inspired by the design language of PUMA’s promoted silos. The spirit combines lightweight, comfort and longevity by using a soft yet highly durable synthetic upper material and a soft lining which shapes to the foot

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
